remarks: The zero functional in the set of functionals with closed kernels. (Contributed by NM, 20-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcd0v.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcd0v.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcd0v.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
lcd0v.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lcd0v.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
lcd0v.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcd0v.o $e |- O = ( 0g ` C ) $.
lcd0v.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcd0v $p |- ( ph -> O = ( V X. { .0. } ) ) $.
